addon.name: IPTV Stalker Generic

extension.description: Generic version of IPTV Stalker Plus with most provider specific features removed, based on ISP Lite 1.1.0

addon.news: v1.0.3 (2017-01-06) - Re-introduce keyword censors v1.0.2 (2017-01-03) - Minor bug fix related to censored channels v1.0.1 (2016-12-31) - Added password field v1.0.0 (2016-12-10) - First Release
